origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.compare_profitability', 'description': 'This function compares the profitability of different insurance companies based on the specified report type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyNames', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of insurance company names to compare.'}, {'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of report to use for comparison, e.g., annual, quarterly.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'comparison', 'description': 'A comparison of profitability for the specified companies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.compare_profitability, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyNames'是['中国人寿', '平安保险', '太平洋保险'], 'reportType'是'annual'.
